data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Kairouan, Tunisia.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kairouan, Tunisia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 170 believers in Kairouan, Tunisia a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.section_summary: On average, 113 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Kairouan, Tunisia.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, help your children in Kairouan, Tunisia find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the state of Kairouan against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Amazigh, Tataouine people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Amazigh, Tataouine people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Amazigh, Tataouine people is yours.
Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 568,038 who are far from you in Kairouan, Tunisia from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Kairouan.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kairouan, Tunisia has a population of 570,600.

We estimate Kairouan has 170 people who might know Jesus, 2,392 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 568,038 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3,356 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help the 170 believers in Kairouan to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 570,430 lost friends and neighbors.
